import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { addDish } from '../../services/dish'; function AddDish() { const [dish, setDish] = useState({ name: "", desc: "", category: "", subcategory: "", price: 0, status: "ACTIVE" }); const handleDishInput = () => event => { const key = event.target.name; const value = event.target.value; setDish({ ...dish, [key]: value }); } const addNewDish = () => { addDish(dish) .then((res) => { console.log(res) }) .catch((error) => { console.log(error) }) } return (
{/* */} {/* */}
Add new dish
) } export default AddDish
